price: ߊ߲ ߞߊ߬ ߞߎ߬ߙߎ ߟߎ߬ ߞߟߏ߫ ߊ߬ ߝߍ߬ ߟߋ߬ ߸ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߛߊߣߌ߲ߧߊ ߞߍ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߥߎ߬ߙߊ ߣߌ߫ ߕߋ߬ߟߋ ߜߍ߫ ߕߎߡߊ ߟߊ߫
arabic: إِنَّا سَخَّرۡنَا ٱلۡجِبَالَ مَعَهُۥ يُسَبِّحۡنَ بِٱلۡعَشِيِّ وَٱلۡإِشۡرَاقِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: innā sakharnā al-jibāla maʿahu yusabbiḥ'na bil-ʿashiyi wal-ish'rāqi
